label: axiom-boundary-smoothness
statement: The boundary of the valid domain must be a $(d-1)$-dimensional $C^1$ submanifold to ensure it has Lebesgue measure zero in the ambient space.
mathematical_expression: $$\partial \mathcal{X}_{\mathrm{valid}} \text{ is a } C^1 \text{ submanifold of } \mathcal{X} \text{ with dimension } (d-1)$$
name: Boundary Smoothness
